summary: The Tanggu Truce, sometimes called the Tangku Truce  was a ceasefire signed between China and Empire of Japan in Tanggu District, Tianjin on May 31, 1933, formally ending the Japanese invasion of Manchuria which had begun two years earlier.
full_text: The Tanggu Truce, sometimes called the Tangku Truce , was a cease-fire signed between Republic of China and Empire of Japan in Tanggu District, Tianjin on May 31, 1933, formally ending the Japanese invasion of Manchuria which had begun two years earlier.
title: Tanggu Truce
